reviewText: I bought this telenovela and it's a great version of the telenovela.  I would recommend it to those that like to watch telenovelas as much as I do.  However, with today's technology I think that they should be able to put the entire telenovela on DVD.  I'm sure people that like to watch telenovelas would purchase it for about $50.00 to $100, if it's the telenovela that they like.  I'm a telenovela buff, so I like to collect them, but sometimes its hard to buy it, if you really haven't watched it on TV, because it doesn't give the whole story line and you sit there and wonder how something happened.  None the less it's a great telenovelas.
Really  liked this telenovela. Had to have it to watch over and over again. A story of a lie gone awry and the hard truth always comes out after great struggles.
Love this Spanish Novela!  Recommend this one to everyone.. Has option of changing the language into English for those who do not know Spanish.

This novela is excellent. For those of you that have not seen it, it will be worth getting. Right now it is airing the last few days, and boy is it tense. I recommend it and will be getting it for my collection.

Chapters Cut OFF. it does not make sens at all, at the end you wonder how did this get here. The editing company should either put the whole telnovela on a DVD and not bother by putting pieces of it in there, which are fulling the customer. I never thought it was going  to come out like this otherwise i would have not bought it!!!!!!!

Very Very Very disappointing. A total disgrace to the novela the actors the story the fans & completely unworthy of the title. The only good thing is the quality of the picture. The company should recall the product & go back to the editing department & have them go back & do it justice.
not bad for a short version many chapter are cut but its only a 4 disc set , little high on the price. I wanted to see the end .

dommage qu'il y ai trop de coupure l histoire en integral est encore mieux,
des points important de l histoire en ete enleves
